name: Behavioral Health Services
description: Seneca’s Behavioral Health services include: - Wraparound and Full-Service Partnerships - Community-Based Behavioral Health Services - Clinic-Based Behavioral Health Services - School-Based Behavioral Health Services - Crisis Response Programs - Mobile Response Teams - STEP Programs - Juvenile Justice Services - Integrated Behavioral Health Services for Permanency and Placement Programs

whatTheyOffer: Seneca’s Behavioral Health services include: - Wraparound and Full-Service Partnerships - Community-Based Behavioral Health Services - Clinic-Based Behavioral Health Services - School-Based Behavioral Health Services - Crisis Response Programs - Mobile Response Teams - STEP Programs - Juvenile Justice Services - Integrated Behavioral Health Services for Permanency and Placement Programs
howToGetIt: For more information contact Seneca at: 8945 Golf Links Rd Oakland, CA 94605 (510) 654-4004
